=== (*) Notes and recipes ===

==== Wireless NIC ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.10 (Intrepid Ibex): (only tested in 1 net) Detects the SSID and asks for the WEP key, but doesn't connect (as if the key was wrong).

==== lsusb ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.10 (Intrepid Ibex): The command freezes in a terminal window, and doesn't show any result. The window needs to be closed.
